title: FS: 1911 T201 W. Johnson/G. Street - SGC 40
author: Archive

posts.post_title: FS: 1911 T201 W. Johnson/G. Street - SGC 40
posts.post_content:
Posted By: steve yawitz
I won this as part of a two-card Johnson group, but don't really collect T201's. The front surface is really nice, but there is a small scuff near the right edge of the stats section on the reverse. $200 includes shipping and insurance.

[URL="http://photos.imageevent.com/yawie99/forsalefortrade/gradedbaseball/large/T201-Johnson-Street-SGC40.jpg"][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/yawie99/forsalefortrade/gradedbaseball/icons/T201-Johnson-Street-SGC40.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

A larger scan - and the remnants of my St. Louis T206 collection - can be found here: http://imageevent.com/yawie99/forsalefortrade/gradedbaseball.


Thanks,
Steve
